name: Run!Melos
description:
"Run, Melos" is a two-player cooperative side-scrolling game (can also be played by one player), the gameplay combines Tetris and Mario, and one player helps the one below by placing/rotating Tetris .Players pass through obstacles and fight off monsters.

The game setting is based on the novels of Japanese writer Osamu Dazai and Greek mythology. It is set that Hermes, the god of messengers, will help Meles return to the kingdom within time, fulfill the agreement with the king, and save his best friend.

This game currently only has a Chinese version, but the amount of text in the game is not large, and it does not affect the gameplay.

The play time is about 1-2 hours.

《奔跑吧，梅樂斯》是一款雙人合作橫版遊戲(也可單人玩)，玩法結合俄羅斯方塊和馬莉歐，一名玩家在上方透過置放/旋轉俄羅斯方塊的方式來幫助下方的玩家穿越障礙物和擊退怪物過關。

遊戲設定則是取材於日本作家太宰治的小說，以及希臘神話。設定為傳令之神荷米斯要幫助梅樂斯在時間內返回王國，履行和國王的約定，以拯救摯友。

這個遊戲目前只有中文版本，但是遊戲的文字量並不大，不影響遊玩。

遊玩時長大約1-2小時。
